Introduction

Kim Yeji (김예지) is a South Korean singer-songwriter. She is a member of the co-ed rock band KARDI which was formed on SuperBand 2.

She released her pre-debut single "Untact" on September 25, 2020, before debuting on October 27, 2020, with the digital single "Hush!" (featuring Dbo). She reached the semi-final on The Voice of Korea in 2020 and also had five consecutive wins on King of Mask Singer in 2022.
